trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="How to buy a custom domain name in Azure App Service Web Apps" description="Learn how to buy a custom domain name with a web app in Azure App Service." services="app-service\web" documentationCenter="" authors="MikeWasson" manager="wpickett" editor=""/>
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="How to buy a custom domain name in Azure App Service Web Apps" description="Learn how to buy a custom domain name with a web app in Azure App Service." services="app-service\web" documentationCenter="" authors="MikeWasson" manager="wpickett" editor=""/>

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="app-service-web" ms.workload="web" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/31/2015" ms.author="mwasson"/>
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="app-service-web" ms.workload="web" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/31/2015" ms.author="mwasson"/>

trans-unit.source: When you create a web app, Azure assigns it to a subdomain of azurewebsites.net.
trans-unit.target: When you create a web app, Azure assigns it to a subdomain of azurewebsites.net.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your web app is named contoso, the URL is contoso.azurewebsites.net.
trans-unit.target: For example, if your web app is named contoso, the URL is contoso.azurewebsites.net.

trans-unit.source: Azure also assigns a virtual IP address.
trans-unit.target: Azure also assigns a virtual IP address.

trans-unit.source: For a production web app, you probably want users to see a custom domain name.
trans-unit.target: For a production web app, you probably want users to see a custom domain name.

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to buy and configure a custom domain with <linkText>App Service Web Apps</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to buy and configure a custom domain with <linkText>App Service Web Apps</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Please do not attempt to purchase a domain using a subscription that does not have an Active Credit Card associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Please do not attempt to purchase a domain using a subscription that does not have an Active Credit Card associated with it.

trans-unit.source: This could result in your subscription being disabled.
trans-unit.target: This could result in your subscription being disabled.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have a domain name for your web app, you can easily buy one on <linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have a domain name for your web app, you can easily buy one on <linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: During the purchase process you can choose to have WWW and root domain's DNS records be mapped to your web app automatically.
trans-unit.target: During the purchase process you can choose to have WWW and root domain's DNS records be mapped to your web app automatically.

trans-unit.source: You also can manage your domain right inside Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: You also can manage your domain right inside Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to buy domain names and assign to your web app.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to buy domain names and assign to your web app.

trans-unit.source: In your browser, open the <linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: In your browser, open the <linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Apps tab, click the name of your web app, select Settings, and then select Custom domains and SSL
trans-unit.target: In the Web Apps tab, click the name of your web app, select Settings, and then select Custom domains and SSL

trans-unit.source: In the Custom domains and SSL blade, click Buy domains.
trans-unit.target: In the Custom domains and SSL blade, click Buy domains.

trans-unit.source: In the Buy Domains blade, use the text box to type the domain name you want to buy and hit Enter.
trans-unit.target: In the Buy Domains blade, use the text box to type the domain name you want to buy and hit Enter.

trans-unit.source: The suggested available domains will be shown just blow the text box.
trans-unit.target: The suggested available domains will be shown just blow the text box.

trans-unit.source: Select what domain you want to buy.
trans-unit.target: Select what domain you want to buy.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to purchase multiple domains at once.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to purchase multiple domains at once.

trans-unit.source: Click the Contact Information and fill the domain's contact information form.
trans-unit.target: Click the Contact Information and fill the domain's contact information form.

trans-unit.source: It is very important that you fill out all required fields with as much accuracy as possible, especially the email address.
trans-unit.target: It is very important that you fill out all required fields with as much accuracy as possible, especially the email address.

trans-unit.source: In case of purchasing the domain without "Privacy protection", you might be asked to verify your email before the domain becomes active.
trans-unit.target: In case of purchasing the domain without "Privacy protection", you might be asked to verify your email before the domain becomes active.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, incorrect data for contact information will result in failure to purchase domains.
trans-unit.target: In some cases, incorrect data for contact information will result in failure to purchase domains.

trans-unit.source: Now you can choose to,
trans-unit.target: Now you can choose to,

trans-unit.source: a) "Auto renew" your domain every year
trans-unit.target: a) "Auto renew" your domain every year

trans-unit.source: b) Opt-in for "Privacy protection" which is included in the purchase price for FREE
trans-unit.target: b) Opt-in for "Privacy protection" which is included in the purchase price for FREE

trans-unit.source: c) "Assign default hostnames" for WWW and root domain to the current Web App.
trans-unit.target: c) "Assign default hostnames" for WWW and root domain to the current Web App.

trans-unit.source: Option C configures DNS bindings and Hostname bindings automatically for you.
trans-unit.target: Option C configures DNS bindings and Hostname bindings automatically for you.

trans-unit.source: This way, your Web App can be accessed using custom domain as soon as the purchase is complete (baring DNS propagation delays in few cases).
trans-unit.target: This way, your Web App can be accessed using custom domain as soon as the purchase is complete (baring DNS propagation delays in few cases).

trans-unit.source: In case, your Web App is behind Azure Traffic Manager, you will not see an option to assign root domain, as A-Records do not work with the Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: In case, your Web App is behind Azure Traffic Manager, you will not see an option to assign root domain, as A-Records do not work with the Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: You can always assign the domains/sub-domains purchased through one Web App to another Web App and vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: You can always assign the domains/sub-domains purchased through one Web App to another Web App and vice-versa.

trans-unit.source: See step 8 for more details.
trans-unit.target: See step 8 for more details.

trans-unit.source: Click the Select on Buy Domains blade, then you will see the purchase information on Purchase confirmation blade.
trans-unit.target: Click the Select on Buy Domains blade, then you will see the purchase information on Purchase confirmation blade.

trans-unit.source: If you accept the legal terms and click Buy, your order will be submitted and you can monitor the purchasing process on Notification.
trans-unit.target: If you accept the legal terms and click Buy, your order will be submitted and you can monitor the purchasing process on Notification.

trans-unit.source: Domain purchase can take few minutes to complete.
trans-unit.target: Domain purchase can take few minutes to complete.

trans-unit.source: If you successfully ordered a domain, you can manage the domain and assign to your web app.
trans-unit.target: If you successfully ordered a domain, you can manage the domain and assign to your web app.

trans-unit.source: Click the "..." at the right side of your domain.
trans-unit.target: Click the "..." at the right side of your domain.

trans-unit.source: Then you can Cancel purchase or Manage domain.
trans-unit.target: Then you can Cancel purchase or Manage domain.

trans-unit.source: Click Manage domain, then we can bind subdomain to our web app on Manage domain blade.
trans-unit.target: Click Manage domain, then we can bind subdomain to our web app on Manage domain blade.

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind a subdomain to a different Web App then perform this step from within the context of the respective Web App.
trans-unit.target: If you want to bind a subdomain to a different Web App then perform this step from within the context of the respective Web App.

trans-unit.source: Over here you an choose to assign the domain to Traffic manager endpoint (if Web App is behind TM) by simply selecting Traffic manager name from the Drop down menu.
trans-unit.target: Over here you an choose to assign the domain to Traffic manager endpoint (if Web App is behind TM) by simply selecting Traffic manager name from the Drop down menu.

trans-unit.source: By doing this, domain/subdomain will be automatically assigned to all the Web Apps behind that Traffic Manager endpoint.
trans-unit.target: By doing this, domain/subdomain will be automatically assigned to all the Web Apps behind that Traffic Manager endpoint.

trans-unit.source: You can "Cancel purchase" within 5 days for full refund.
trans-unit.target: You can "Cancel purchase" within 5 days for full refund.

trans-unit.source: After 5 days you will not be able to "Cancel purchase", instead you will see an option to "Delete" the domain.
trans-unit.target: After 5 days you will not be able to "Cancel purchase", instead you will see an option to "Delete" the domain.

trans-unit.source: Deleting the domain will result in releasing it from your subscription without refund and will become available domain.
trans-unit.target: Deleting the domain will result in releasing it from your subscription without refund and will become available domain.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you should be able to enter the custom domain name in your browser and see that it successfully takes you to your web app.
trans-unit.target: At this point, you should be able to enter the custom domain name in your browser and see that it successfully takes you to your web app.
